title: The time of an automatically closing door should be minimum 5 second and the closing speed should not exceed 0
clause_text: The time of an automatically closing door should be minimum 5 second and the closing speed should not exceed 0.25 m/sec.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The time of an automatically closing door should be minimum 5 second and the closing speed should not exceed 0.25 m/sec.
